Oklahoma_City.Founders Tower (Oklahoma City): Founders Tower (formerly known as the United Founders Life Tower and The 360 at Founders Plaza) is a Googie-style skyscraper located northwest of downtown Oklahoma City in the U.S. state of Oklahoma. The tower is one of the most well-known landmarks in the city's skyline. It has a height of 275 feet (84 m) and 20 stories, with a restaurant featuring 360-degree panoramic views of Oklahoma City on its top floor.
